articles.title: Why the Penguin Random House Merger Is Also About Amazon - The New York Times
articles.description: The U.S. wants to stop Penguin Random House from buying Simon & Schuster. The elephant in the room is Amazon.
articles.content: As the dominant way Americans find and buy books, Amazon can, in theory, steer people to titles that generate more income for the company. If authors or publishers dont want their books sold on Amazo… [+1346 chars]

articles.title: JetBlue's Awful Financial Results: This Can't Be Good - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: While most US airlines reported a second quarter profit, JetBlue reported a loss. What does this mean for the future of the airline?
